item.description:
Well the WX has bumped us again, Now I am realy crabby! To heck with wendsday, lets go Thursday and enjoy the flight with clear sky's.....


Let's buzz down to Long Island NY to have dinner at Ricks Crabby Cowboy Cafe. It is only a short 69nm flight with a hop across the sound to MTP ($17 ramp fee) and then a walk across the street (well sort of) to a nice spot overlooking the harbor.

http://www.navmonster...

http://www.crabbycowb...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Steve and Patty and 6090L in front of the terminal.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Feeling Crabby??? lets try again... and again
